content.html: I hoped this site wasn’t gonna die but the speed of its decline is frankly terrifying. Musk firing clearly incredibly knowledgable staff *in public* while hacking at the site with a machete. The god awful features, rushed out, cancelled, then reinstated is madness.
content.value:
I hoped this site wasn’t gonna die but the speed of its decline is frankly terrifying. 

Musk firing clearly incredibly knowledgable staff *in public* while hacking at the site with a machete. 

The god awful features, rushed out, cancelled, then reinstated is madness.
